features: EASY OPERATION-Just press the ON/OFF switch to brew and enjoy flavorful coffee in minutes. ON/OFF indicator light lets you know when your coffee maker is on or off.
KEEP WARM-Stain-resistant warming plate keeps coffee warm until you turn it off, ensuring every cup you drink is hot coffee.
REUSABLE FILTER-No need for paper filters. Removable filter basket for quick and easy cleanup.
PAUSE & SERVE FEATURE-Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle if you need a cup before brewing is finished.
COMPACT SIZE-Space-saving 4 cups (1 cup = 5 oz) coffee machine with visible 600ml large capacity tank, perfect for home and Office use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Operation Tips 2 Operation Guide 3 Cleaning Process 4 Deep Cleaning

I think the coffee tastes a little weak, what can I do to make good taste coffee. Hello. There are 3 main factors that affect the taste of coffee, one is the bean, the other is the thickness of the coffee powder, and the other is the amount of coffee powder. It brews slower and takes more time to finish brewing. what is the problem? Does descaling need to be done? Yes. The cause of your?problem may be that there is a build-up of limescale inside the boiler or heating tube, which will result in a slower flow of water, which ultimately results in a longer brewing time. Why is my coffee overflowing from the filter? There are several reasons: 1.Adding too much ground coffee to the filter. 2. Use filter paper and permanent filter at the same time. 3. Misplacement of carafe. 4.Carafe is taken away for more than 30s during the brewing process. I Just received the Gevi coffee maker and it feels too small Hi, thanks for your question about our machine. Gevi 4 Cups Small Coffee Maker is positioned as small and exquisite, which is characterized by small size but large capacity, saving space for you. There is water coming out of the back of the 4 cup coffee maker There is an overflow hole on the back of the machine, when you add water to the water tank beyond the MAX line, the water will flow out of the overflow hole. So please be careful not to exceed the MAX line when adding water.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small coffee maker for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: Gevi 4 is selling a compact coffee machine that can save you money over restaurant bought coffee. I find it easy to use and easy to clean. All you have to buy is coffee because it comes with a reusable filter for everyday usage. This is also a great gift for a coffee drinker loved one.
